author: Matthew Impelli
title: U.S. Coronavirus Map Update: Latest on Where COVID-19 Cases Are Located
description: The map tracks where the coronavirus outbreak is spreading across the U.S., now the epicenter of the global pandemic.
content: While nearly every state has implemented some kind of social distancing or stay-at-home measure as a way to combat the spread of the coronavirus, the U.S. has become the virus's epicenter, with 378,000 infected individuals and at least 11,851 deaths, a tracke… [+2463 chars]
